comment.body:
> [ekaterina](#comment_24_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): Could be, the cache is a bit weird sometimes.

I've had cache issues too with developing sites. Mostly CSS and JS. I usually visit the resource directly and Shift+F5 refresh it to get the latest version and clear the old one out of the cache.

It's possible to donate directly to a site address and the site owner can import the private key into bitcoin to receive the funds. It's probably a bit technical though for authors to go through the private key import process.
